recipe.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipe.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Beat the eggs and mix with the grated cheeses in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and combine with the pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

recipe.name: Margherita Pizza
recipe.description: A simple yet delicious pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (430°F).
Spread the tomato sauce over the pizza base.
Add slices of mozzarella and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is melted.

recipe.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipe.description: A popular Indian curry with marinated chicken in a spiced tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste for 1 hour.
Cook the chicken in a pan until lightly browned.
Sauté onions and garlic in the same pan.
Add tomato puree and spices, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in the cream and cooked chicken, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

recipe.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.description: A quick and healthy dish with fresh vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add garlic and stir-fry until fragrant.
Add all vegetables and cook on high heat for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir until vegetables are coated.
Serve immediately with rice or noodles.

recipe.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipe.description: Classic cookies with gooey chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
Add eggs and vanilla, and mix well.
Stir in flour and baking soda until combined.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipe.name: Caesar Salad
recipe.description: Classic salad with crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and creamy dressing.
instructions: Grill chicken breasts seasoned with salt and pepper.
Chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Slice grilled chicken.
Toss lettuce with croutons and parmesan.
Add chicken on top.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing.

recipe.name: Beef Lasagna
recipe.description: Layered pasta with rich beef sauce and melted cheese.
instructions: Brown ground beef with onions and garlic.
Add tomato sauce and seasonings.
Layer lasagna sheets, meat sauce, and cheeses.
Bake at 180°C for 45 minutes.
Let rest for 10 minutes before serving.

recipe.name: Vegetable Lasagna
recipe.description: A delightful vegetarian lasagna packed with seasonal vegetables.
instructions: Roast vegetables with olive oil.
Layer lasagna sheets with roasted vegetables.
Add ricotta and mozzarella between layers.
Cover with tomato sauce.
Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes.
Garnish with fresh basil.

recipe.name: Thai Green Curry
recipe.description: Spicy and creamy Thai curry with vegetables and chicken.
instructions: Sauté green curry paste.
Add chicken and cook until white.
Pour in coconut milk.
Add vegetables and simmer.
Season with fish sauce and sugar.
Garnish with Thai basil.
Serve with jasmine rice.

recipe.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipe.description: Creamy Italian rice dish with wild mushrooms.
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil.
Add rice and toast lightly.
Deglaze with white wine.
Gradually add stock while stirring.
Add mushrooms halfway through cooking.
Finish with parmesan and thyme.
